nodes.text: A slaver's nest was located on Carrandar Secundus, where it was destroyed by the Galactic Empire around five years before the Battle of Yavin. The Human girl Merei Spanjaf read about the nest's destruction on a newsfeed on her datapad.
The slaver's nest was first mentioned in Servants of the Empire: Rebel in the Ranks, a novel written by Jason Fry and published in 2015.
